verses.text: All the \w commandments|strong="H4687"\w* which I \w command|strong="H6680"\w* thee this \w day|strong="H3117"\w* shall ye \w observe|strong="H8104"\w* to \w do|strong="H6213"\w*, that ye may \w live|strong="H2421"\w*, and \w multiply|strong="H7235"\w*, and go \w in|strong="H0935"\w* and \w possess|strong="H3423"\w* the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* which the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w sware|strong="H7650"\w* unto your \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w*.

And thou shalt \w remember|strong="H2142"\w* all the \w way|strong="H1870"\w* which the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w led|strong="H3212"\w* thee these \w forty|strong="H0705"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w* in the \w wilderness|strong="H4057"\w*, to \w humble|strong="H6031"\w* thee, \add and\add* to \w prove|strong="H5254"\w* thee, to \w know|strong="H3045"\w* what \add was\add* in thine \w heart|strong="H3824"\w*, whether thou wouldest \w keep|strong="H8104"\w* his \w commandments|strong="H4687"\w*, or no.

And he \w humbled|strong="H6031"\w* thee, and suffered thee to \w hunger|strong="H7456"\w*, and \w fed|strong="H0398"\w* thee with \w manna|strong="H4478"\w*, which thou \w knewest|strong="H3045"\w* not, neither did thy \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w* \w know|strong="H3045"\w*; that he might make thee \w know|strong="H3045"\w* that \w man|strong="H0120"\w* doth not \w live|strong="H2421"\w* by \w bread|strong="H3899"\w* \w only|strong="H0905"\w*, but by every \add word\add* that \w proceedeth|strong="H4161"\w* out of the \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* doth \w man|strong="H0120"\w* \w live|strong="H2421"\w*.

Thy \w raiment|strong="H8071"\w* waxed not \w old|strong="H1086"\w* upon thee, neither did thy \w foot|strong="H7272"\w* \w swell|strong="H1216"\w*, these \w forty|strong="H0705"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w*.

Thou shalt also \w consider|strong="H3045"\w* \w in|strong="H5973"\w* thine \w heart|strong="H3824"\w*, that, as a \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \w chasteneth|strong="H3256"\w* his \w son|strong="H1121"\w*, \add so\add* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w chasteneth|strong="H3256"\w* thee.

Therefore thou shalt \w keep|strong="H8104"\w* the \w commandments|strong="H4687"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, to \w walk|strong="H3212"\w* in his \w ways|strong="H1870"\w*, and to \w fear|strong="H3372"\w* him.

For the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w bringeth|strong="H0935"\w* thee into a \w good|strong="H2896"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w*, a \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w brooks|strong="H5158"\w* of \w water|strong="H4325"\w*, of \w fountains|strong="H5869"\w* and \w depths|strong="H8415"\w* that spring \w out|strong="H3318"\w* of \w valleys|strong="H1237"\w* and \w hills|strong="H2022"\w*;

A \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w wheat|strong="H2406"\w*, and \w barley|strong="H8184"\w*, and \w vines|strong="H1612"\w*, and fig \w trees|strong="H8384"\w*, and \w pomegranates|strong="H7416"\w*; a \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w oil|strong="H8081"\w* \w olive|strong="H2132"\w*, and \w honey|strong="H1706"\w*;\f + \fr 8.8 \ft of oilâ€¦: Heb. of olive tree of oil\f*

A \w land|strong="H0776"\w* \w wherein|strong="H0834"\w* thou shalt \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* \w bread|strong="H3899"\w* \w without|strong="H3808"\w* \w scarceness|strong="H4544"\w*, thou shalt not \w lack|strong="H2637"\w* any \add thing\add* in it; a \w land|strong="H0776"\w* whose \w stones|strong="H0068"\w* \add are\add* \w iron|strong="H1270"\w*, and out of whose \w hills|strong="H2042"\w* thou mayest \w dig|strong="H2672"\w* \w brass|strong="H5178"\w*.

When thou hast \w eaten|strong="H0398"\w* and art \w full|strong="H7646"\w*, then thou shalt \w bless|strong="H1288"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w* for the \w good|strong="H2896"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w* which he hath \w given|strong="H5414"\w* thee.

\w Beware|strong="H8104"\w* that thou \w forget|strong="H7911"\w* not the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, in not \w keeping|strong="H8104"\w* his \w commandments|strong="H4687"\w*, and his \w judgments|strong="H4941"\w*, and his \w statutes|strong="H2708"\w*, which I \w command|strong="H6680"\w* thee this \w day|strong="H3117"\w*:

Lest \add when\add* thou hast \w eaten|strong="H0398"\w* and art \w full|strong="H7646"\w*, and hast \w built|strong="H1129"\w* \w goodly|strong="H2896"\w* \w houses|strong="H1004"\w*, and \w dwelt|strong="H3427"\w* \add therein;\add*

And \add when\add* thy \w herds|strong="H1241"\w* and thy \w flocks|strong="H6629"\w* \w multiply|strong="H7235"\w*, and thy \w silver|strong="H3701"\w* and thy \w gold|strong="H2091"\w* is \w multiplied|strong="H7235"\w*, and all that thou hast is \w multiplied|strong="H7235"\w*;

Then thine \w heart|strong="H3824"\w* be lifted \w up|strong="H7311"\w*, and thou \w forget|strong="H7911"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, which brought thee \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* out of the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*, from the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w bondage|strong="H5650"\w*;

Who \w led|strong="H3212"\w* thee through that \w great|strong="H1419"\w* and \w terrible|strong="H3372"\w* \w wilderness|strong="H4057"\w*, \add wherein were\add* \w fiery|strong="H8314"\w* \w serpents|strong="H5175"\w*, and \w scorpions|strong="H6137"\w*, and \w drought|strong="H6774"\w*, where \add there was\add* no \w water|strong="H4325"\w*; who brought thee \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* \w water|strong="H4325"\w* out of the \w rock|strong="H6697"\w* of \w flint|strong="H2496"\w*;

Who \w fed|strong="H0398"\w* thee in the \w wilderness|strong="H4057"\w* with \w manna|strong="H4478"\w*, which thy \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w* \w knew|strong="H3045"\w* not, that he might \w humble|strong="H6031"\w* thee, and that he might \w prove|strong="H5254"\w* thee, to do thee \w good|strong="H3190"\w* at thy latter \w end|strong="H0319"\w*;

And thou \w say|strong="H0559"\w* in thine \w heart|strong="H3824"\w*, My \w power|strong="H3581"\w* and the \w might|strong="H6108"\w* of \add mine\add* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* hath \w gotten|strong="H6213"\w* me this \w wealth|strong="H2428"\w*.

But thou shalt \w remember|strong="H2142"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w*: for \add it is\add* he that \w giveth|strong="H5414"\w* thee \w power|strong="H3581"\w* to \w get|strong="H6213"\w* \w wealth|strong="H2428"\w*, that he may \w establish|strong="H6965"\w* his \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w* which he \w sware|strong="H7650"\w* unto thy \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w*, as \add it is\add* this \w day|strong="H3117"\w*.

And it shall be, if thou do at \w all|strong="H7911"\w* \w forget|strong="H7911"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, and \w walk|strong="H1980"\w* \w after|strong="H0310"\w* \w other|strong="H0312"\w* \w gods|strong="H0430"\w*, and \w serve|strong="H5647"\w* them, and \w worship|strong="H7812"\w* them, I \w testify|strong="H5749"\w* against you this \w day|strong="H3117"\w* that ye shall \w surely|strong="H0006"\w* \w perish|strong="H0006"\w*.

As the \w nations|strong="H1471"\w* which the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w destroyeth|strong="H0006"\w* before your \w face|strong="H6440"\w*, so shall ye \w perish|strong="H0006"\w*; \w because|strong="H6118"\w* ye would not be \w obedient|strong="H8085"\w* unto the \w voice|strong="H6963"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* your \w God|strong="H0430"\w*.
